# Field Support Services Project (FSSP) - Colombia and Ecuador
## Solicitation Information
* **Solicitation Reference Number**: CB-915-23032348
* **Amendment Number**: 6
* **Solicitation Number**: 23-236864-1
* **Publication Date**: February 1, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 27, 2024 2:00:00 PM EST

## Project Description
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development Canada (DFATD) solicits proposals for the Field Support Services Project (FSSP) to enhance the efficiency of program and project stakeholders and improve the impact of Canada’s international assistance in Colombia and Ecuador. This project aims to strengthen Canada's bilateral development programs by utilizing outsourced local support services.

## Objectives and Scope
The FSSP will focus on improving the relevance of Canada's programming in Colombia (approximately 75% of the activities) and Ecuador (approximately 25% of the activities). The expected outcomes of the FSSP are to address local development challenges and opportunities that benefit the most marginalized and vulnerable in both countries.

## Tender Notice
The FSSP is a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the “Competitive – Open Bidding” category. The selection criteria will be based on the combined rating of the technical merit and price. Trade agreements listed include the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and others.

## Tender Specifications
The project delivery regions include the National Capital Region (NCR), Colombia, and Ecuador. The estimated country distribution of activities is 75% for Colombia and 25% for Ecuador. The FSSP will be delivered under a fixed price contract. Proposals must be received by March 27, 2024, at 2:00:00 PM EST.
